document_data.name: Happy Hands
document_data.mainbody:
'''Happy Hands''' was a member of [[Fetcher's Brats]] and alter, [[The Guild]], from the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''Don't bug me, I'm making plans. Big plans, see?''|Happy Hands}}
document_data.Description: Happy Hands was a young [[human]] boy with a light skin tone, dark blue eyes, and straw-colored hair. He wore a garb dyed with the Guild's green color and was the brains of the group.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Happy Hands was a part of a street urchin gang led by [[Osgur Hallorn|Osgur "Fetcher" Hallorn]]. When the man disappeared following a break out of a guild war between [[Nine-Fingers Keene]] and the [[Stone Lord]], Fetcher's Brats were taken in by the Guild and given shelter in the Guildhall. [[Sticky Dondo]] took on the role of the leaders among the kids and Happy Hands took on the role of the group's planner and strategist.
